task_summary: The robot locates a towel and moves its end effector to a position above or immediately adjacent to it, as visually confirmed in the frames.

task_long_description.overview: This episode features a bimanual robot executing a reach motion towards a towel laid out on a surface. The workspace contains a towel over simulated grass or mat. The robot begins away from the towel and, via perception and motion primitives, approaches to hover at or above the towel's surface, aligning the end effector for possible subsequent manipulation.
preconditions: Robot is powered on and homed.
Towel is spread out flat in workspace.
stepwise_plan: Check if towel is visible; scan if not.
Move above the towel with a small vertical offset.
Approach and align precisely with towel surface.
success_criteria: End effector is above and aligned with the towel.
failure_and_recovery: Towel not detected: robot scans up to 3 times.
Alignment fails: does not proceed to contact.
Obstruction: episode terminates after recovery attempts.
task_long_description.termination: Behavior ends once the robot is precisely aligned above the towel.

frame_3.now_evidence: first stable contact and alignment cue visible
frame_3.predicts_next: push actuation expected; confirms goal direction

node_specs.description: Checks if the towel is currently visible to the perception system.
Performs a line scan to look for the towel up to three times.
Detects and localizes the towel after it has been seen.
Moves end effector to a pose above the towel with a 0.05m vertical offset.
Approaches and aligns to the towel position with a tight positional tolerance.

failure_modes: Towel not visible due to occlusion or sensor failure
recovery_strategy: Scan up to 3 times for target towel before aborting
Abort sequence if towel cannot be localized/approached
assumptions: Instruction specifies only 'reach'; frames clarify target is the towel and ending pose is above/adjacent to it.
No evidence of grasp or manipulationâ€”end effector does not grasp, only approaches and aligns.

expected_success_criteria: End effector is positioned above and aligned to towel
No collision with towel or table
